thoughtCard.title: Write about your feelings
thoughtCard.placeholderString: What's on your mind today? Share your thoughts, felling and experiences here...

quoteCard.title: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice. üòä
quoteCard.subtitle: Today's inspiration

positive: Happiness is a journey, not a destination.
Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
Choose joy today and let it shine.
Positive thoughts create positive outcomes.
Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
Smile, it‚Äôs contagious and healing.
Small steps lead to big changes.
Every sunrise is an invitation to shine.
Good vibes only attract good energy.
Celebrate progress, not just perfection.
Your light brightens someone‚Äôs world.
Joy multiplies when shared with others.
See the good, be the good.
Every moment holds a new beginning.
Optimism fuels resilience.
Happiness grows when you nurture it.
Your mindset shapes your reality.
Look for the magic in every day.
You radiate positivity wherever you go.
Be a rainbow in someone‚Äôs cloud.
Kindness is free, sprinkle it everywhere.
Focus on the bright side of life.
Positive energy is powerful energy.
Every day is a fresh start.
Choose to shine, even on cloudy days.
The best is yet to come.
Happiness is homemade.
Your smile can change the world.
Stay hopeful, stay happy.
Light attracts light‚Äîshine on.
Happiness looks good on you.
Be grateful, be joyful, be kind.
A cheerful heart is good medicine.
Surround yourself with sunshine.
Positivity is a superpower.
Happiness begins with self-love.
Good things take time, stay patient.
Every day is a gift‚Äîunwrap it.
Positive energy creates positive life.
Stay inspired, stay unstoppable.
Your joy is your strength.
When you smile, the world smiles too.
Good thoughts bring good things.
Keep your face to the sunshine.
Happiness grows where gratitude flows.
Choose love, choose joy.
Be the reason someone smiles today.
Positive minds create positive futures.
Happiness is not out there, it‚Äôs within.
Radiate positivity and watch it return.
negative: It‚Äôs okay to not be okay.
Tough times never last, but tough people do.
This too shall pass.
Your feelings are valid.
Healing takes time, be patient with yourself.
Storms make trees take deeper roots.
Every setback is a setup for a comeback.
Even the darkest night ends with sunrise.
Don‚Äôt be afraid to take a break.
You are stronger than you think.
Crying is not weakness, it‚Äôs release.
Every scar tells a story of survival.
You‚Äôve survived 100% of your hardest days.
One step at a time is enough.
It‚Äôs okay to ask for help.
Breathe, relax, and try again.
Pain is temporary, growth is permanent.
Some days are heavy, and that‚Äôs okay.
Rest is part of the process.
Be gentle with yourself today.
Not every day will be bright, but brighter days will come.
Your worth is not defined by your struggles.
It‚Äôs okay to slow down.
Healing is not linear.
You don‚Äôt have to be positive all the time.
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful places.
Take things one moment at a time.
You are allowed to feel what you feel.
Your story is not over yet.
The rain will stop, the sun will shine again.
Strength grows in moments of challenge.
Even small steps move you forward.
It‚Äôs okay to let go of what hurts.
Bad days don‚Äôt last forever.
Your feelings don‚Äôt make you weak.
Take rest, then rise again.
Sometimes surviving is enough.
The hardest battles teach the greatest lessons.
You‚Äôre allowed to start over anytime.
Sadness is part of being human.
Even broken crayons still color.
You are not alone in this.
Better days are already on their way.
Don‚Äôt be hard on yourself for struggling.
Healing begins with acceptance.
Scars are proof that you healed.
Your pace is the right pace.
Strength is built through struggles.
Sometimes it‚Äôs okay to just breathe.
After rain comes the rainbow.
neutral: Balance is the key to everything.
Every day is a new opportunity.
Go with the flow of life.
Peace begins with a quiet mind.
Sometimes doing nothing is doing something.
Flow where the river takes you.
Life is about balance, not extremes.
Slow and steady keeps you steady.
Stay steady through the ups and downs.
Let go and allow things to be.
Each day is a chance to reset.
The middle path leads to calm.
Balance your mind, balance your life.
Calm seas don‚Äôt make skilled sailors.
Live in the present, not the past or future.
Not all days are highs or lows, some are in-between.
Let life be what it is today.
Evenness of mind is true peace.
Every day doesn‚Äôt need a label.
Calm is a kind of happiness.
A balanced life is a good life.
